001.name: Commander
001.text: I see you’ve returned. Is it done?

003.name: Commander
003.text: I’m giving you another task now.

004.name: Commander
004.text: We need to upgrade the weapons of our ship. All of them.

005.name: Commander
005.text: We need all the preparations that we can do just to increase our chances of surviving.

006.name: Commander
006.text: Go to the Weapon Technician and tell him of the task.
